mapper.sql: select id id, driver_class driverClass, name name, password password, url url, username username, type type, initial_size initialSize, max_active maxActive, min_idle minIdle, is_deleted isDeleted, gmt_create gmtCreate, gmt_modified gmtModified from db
mapper.update: update db set is_deleted=1,gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id=#{id}
update db set is_deleted=1,gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id in (#{item})

update db set driver_class=#{driverClass}, name=#{name}, password=#{password}, url=#{url}, username=#{username}, type=#{type}, initial_size=#{initialSize}, max_active=#{maxActive}, min_idle=#{minIdle}, gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id=#{id}

update db set driver_class=#{driverClass}, name=#{name}, password=#{password}, url=#{url}, username=#{username}, type=#{type}, initial_size=#{initialSize}, max_active=#{maxActive}, min_idle=#{minIdle}, gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id=#{id}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as id
insert into db ( driver_class, name, password, url, username, type, initial_size, max_active, min_idle, is_deleted,gmt_create,gmt_modified ) values ( #{driverClass}, #{name}, #{password}, #{url}, #{username}, #{type}, #{initialSize}, #{maxActive}, #{minIdle}, 0,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as id
insert into db ( driver_class, name, password, url, username, type, initial_size, max_active, min_idle, is_deleted,gmt_create,gmt_modified ) values ( #{driverClass}, #{name}, #{password}, #{url}, #{username}, #{type}, #{initialSize}, #{maxActive}, #{minIdle}, 0,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

insert into db ( driver_class, name, password, url, username, type, initial_size, max_active, min_idle, is_deleted,gmt_create,gmt_modified ) values
( #{item.driverClass}, #{item.name}, #{item.password}, #{item.url}, #{item.username}, #{item.type}, #{item.initialSize}, #{item.maxActive}, #{item.minIdle}, 0,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
